name: Evasion Garden Simulator 2017
description:
This little game is made for a personal jam that I'm hosting every week to improve my knowledge about Unity and build my own portfolio.

Assets have been obatined from:

https://freesound.org/ (sounds)

https://opengameart.org/ (sprites)

All with CC license.

The game is simple: you are able to build your own garden, relax and let your imagination fly.

It would be nice to have more props to use and plants, but, I think this is enough to have an idea about what this game wants to be. Maybe in the future I can add some assets and other functions (who knows).

Enjoy!

If you want to know more about my projects, check my webpage (only spanish):

http://www.devboybebop.es/

Or follow me on twitter:

https://twitter.com/aportillog92
